synopsis.text: Before Tohru's journey unfolded, her parents, Kyoko and Katsuya, had a story of their own that remained untold - until now. This compilation film delves into the untold chapters of Kyoko's tumultuous past, her transformation, and the pivotal role Katsuya played in her life. Witness their heartwarming love story and the inception of the Honda family, filling in the gaps left by the previous seasons of the beloved anime. Additionally, the film also brings forth never-before-seen scenes that take place after the conclusion of the third season, offering a fresh perspective to the cherished Fruits Basket saga.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
